entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 March 2023
